translation.en: Isn't it cute? We can afford this.
translation.zh: 漂亮吧？我们能买得起

translation.en: And know what else it has, it's got wall-to-wall carpeting.
translation.zh: 还有 房间铺满了地毯

translation.en: It has a fireplace.
translation.zh: 外加壁炉

translation.en: And a big kitchen.
translation.zh: 还有一个大厨房

translation.en: It's close to the schools.
translation.zh: 离学校很近

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-没什么

translation.en: It's great, Sherry. It's great. You did a great job.
translation.zh: 房子很好 雪莉 你做得很好

translation.en: Look, buddy. I've put in my time.
translation.zh: 听着 我花了很长时间

translation.en: I've been very patient waiting for us to get this money together...
translation.zh: 一直在耐心地等着我们凑够这笔钱

translation.en: ...so we could get married and do this right.
translation.zh: 这样我们就能正常结婚

translation.en: You owe me. Come on.
translation.zh: 你欠我的 来吧

translation.en: I think you're gonna like it.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢的

translation.en: -Hey, Joe, what do you know? -Not much.
translation.zh: -喂 乔 有什么新闻吗？-没什么

translation.en: Mary Ann, could I get another beer down here, please?
translation.zh: 玛丽安 能再给我来杯啤酒吗？

translation.en: Sure, coming right up.
translation.zh: 好的 马上就来

translation.en: Hey, Pete, what are you doing tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 喂 皮特 你明晚打算干嘛？

translation.en: A little TV.
translation.zh: 看看电视

translation.en: Coach Parseghian is speaking at the Chicago Gridiron Club.
translation.zh: 帕斯基恩教练要在芝加哥橄榄球场俱乐部发表讲话

translation.en: -You wanna go? -Sure.
translation.zh: -你想去吗？-当然了

translation.en: If Rhonda will let me stay out that late.
translation.zh: 如果朗达能让我在外面待那么晚的话

translation.en: Tell her the D train gets back no later than 10:30.
translation.zh: 告诉她D号火车十点半之前就会回来

translation.en: -Oh, sure, of course. -Ara Parseghian?
translation.zh: -没问题-阿拉帕斯基恩？

translation.en: You just can't give it up.
translation.zh: 你就是没法放弃 是吗？

translation.en: He's the greatest coach in the country, Frank.
translation.zh: 他是这个国家最优秀的教练 弗兰克

translation.en: Are you gonna get his autographed picture and kiss it every night?
translation.zh: 你打算拿到他的签名照每天晚上都亲一下吗？

translation.en: What is your problem?
translation.zh: 你有毛病吗？

translation.en: Or maybe he'll give you permission to wipe his ass.
translation.zh: 或者他会允许你帮他擦屁股

translation.en: -Hey, why don't you leave him alone. -You mind your own business.
translation.zh: -喂 你不要管他行吗？-管好你自己的事吧

translation.en: As long as my brother talks this crazy Notre Dame shit...
translation.zh: 只要我弟弟还在谈论什么圣母大学

translation.en: ...he deserves anything that comes his way.
translation.zh: 一切后果都是他咎由自取

translation.en: Hey, you were a pretty big Notre Dame fan.
translation.zh: 你也曾是圣母大学的忠实球迷

translation.en: Yeah, I used to collect baseball cards too.
translation.zh: 是啊 我以前还收集棒球卡呢

translation.en: Forget about it.
translation.zh: 算了

translation.en: You know what Coach Gillespie said about you, Frank?
translation.zh: 你知道葛莱斯皮教练怎么说你的吗弗兰克？

translation.en: -Pete. -He said you had a lot of talent.
translation.zh: -皮特-他说你很有天赋

translation.en: But your problem was you were too afraid of getting hit.
translation.zh: 但你的问题就在于不敢跟别人冲撞

translation.en: -You had no guts. -Go to hell, Pete.
translation.zh: -你没有种-去死吧 皮特

translation.en: -Come on. -It's okay.
translation.zh: -算了吧-没事的

translation.en: He used to tell me, if you had one half of Rudy's heart and desire...
translation.zh: 他常跟我说 你要是有鲁迪一半的决心和追求

translation.en: ...you could have been all-conference.
translation.zh: 你就能进全美橄榄球联会

translation.en: He said you were a pussy.
translation.zh: 他说了你是个娘娘腔

translation.en: Hey. Frank!
translation.zh: 喂 弗兰克！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Come on, Frank.
translation.zh: 算了 弗兰克

translation.en: -Rudy! Rudy, that's enough! -All right! All right!
translation.zh: -鲁迪！鲁迪 够了！-好了！好了！

translation.en: That's enough, you hear me? Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 闹够了 你听见了吗？听到我说话了吗？

translation.en: That's enough!
translation.zh: 够了！

translation.en: Frank. Good.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 好了

translation.en: Don't nothing ever change?
translation.zh: 还是老样子？

translation.en: Throw them out, Mary Ann.
translation.zh: 把他们赶出去 玛丽安

translation.en: You didn't have to get into it with Frank like that.
translation.zh: 你不用跟弗兰克闹成那样

translation.en: I can take care of myself.
translation.zh: 我自己能处理

translation.en: I know you can. That was between him and me.
translation.zh: 我知道你能 可那是我跟他之间的事

translation.en: Ever since he started working here, he's been pissed off at the world.
translation.zh: 自从他在这里上班之后就一副愤世嫉俗的样子

translation.en: Yeah, because he's not the same kind of god around here...
translation.zh: 因为他在这里不能像在高中时一样

translation.en: ...that he was in high school.
translation.zh: 呼风唤雨了

translation.en: It's that damn pipe head again. Emergency water.
translation.zh: 又是那个该死的管道接头快使用备用水

translation.en: We got a breakout!
translation.zh: 漏水了！

translation.en: -Rudy, I need more water! -I'm not getting anything!
translation.zh: -鲁迪 我需要更多的水！-我这里没水！

translation.en: Try another valve!
translation.zh: 试试另一个阀门！

translation.en: I'm not getting anything, Pete.
translation.zh: 还是没有水 皮特

translation.en: -Come on, goddamn it. -There's no pressure in the line!
translation.zh: -快点 见鬼-管道内没有压力！

translation.en: We need to get out of here, there's no pressure!
translation.zh: 我们得离开这里 没有压力！

translation.en: Try something!
translation.zh: 试试别的办法！

translation.en: Pete!
translation.zh: 皮特！

translation.en: Let us pray.
translation.zh: 让我们祷告吧

translation.en: Oh, God, who alone are ever merciful and sparing of punishment...
translation.zh: 仁慈而又宽厚的上帝

translation.en: ...humbly we pray you in behalf of the soul of your servant, Peter...
translation.zh: 我们代表您的仆人皮特谦卑地向您祷告

translation.en: ...whom you have commanded to go forth today from this world.
translation.zh: 您今日令他离开这个世界

translation.en: Do not hand him over to the power of the enemy...
translation.zh: 请不要将他交在敌人之手

translation.en: ...and do not forget him forever...
translation.zh: 永远不要忘记他

translation.en: ...but command that this soul be taken up by the holy angels...
translation.zh: 而要将这个灵魂托付给神圣的天使

translation.en: ...and brought home to paradise.
translation.zh: 带回天堂

translation.en: So that, since he hoped and believed in you...
translation.zh: 因为他渴慕您 相信您

translation.en: ...he may not undergo the punishments of hell....
translation.zh: 让他不用遭受地狱的惩罚

translation.en: -...but rather possess everlasting joys. -I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -而是拥有永恒的欢乐-真是抱歉

translation.en: -Through Christ our Lord, amen. -Amen.
translation.zh: -我主保佑 阿门-阿门

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: You wanna just go home?
translation.zh: 想回家吗？

translation.en: I'm going to South Bend.
translation.zh: 我要去南本德

translation.en: Now is not the time.
translation.zh: 现在不是时候

translation.en: If I don't go now, I'll never be any good for you, or for me, or anybody.
translation.zh: 如果我现在不去 就永远没法面对你面对自己或是任何人

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: ...if you have to go, then you'll have to go alone.
translation.zh: 如果你一定要走 那就只能一个人去

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Dad...
translation.zh: 爸爸…

translation.en: ...what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这干嘛？

translation.en: You can take a couple of weeks off.
translation.zh: 你可以休几周假

translation.en: Your grandfather saved all of his life...
translation.zh: 你爷爷一辈子省吃俭用

translation.en: ...to bring the family to this country.
translation.zh: 把一家人带到了这个国家

translation.en: He got a good job on the stockyard, he had a nice little house...
translation.zh: 他在饲养场找了份好工作有了一栋漂亮的小房子

translation.en: ...South Chicago.
translation.zh: 在芝加哥南部

translation.en: When I was about 12...
translation.zh: 我大概12岁那年

translation.en: ...somebody sold him on the idea he-- He ought to move to the country...
translation.zh: 有人鼓动他 让他搬到乡下

translation.en: ...and become a dairy farmer.
translation.zh: 当个奶农

translation.en: He buys some land, you know, and gets a couple hundred cows.
translation.zh: 他买了一些地 有了几百头奶牛

translation.en: Within five months, every one of those cows was dead with disease.
translation.zh: 不到五个月 所有的奶牛都病死了

translation.en: It was the Depression.
translation.zh: 当时正值大萧条时期

translation.en: Couldn't sell the land...
translation.zh: 地卖不掉…

translation.en: ...there was no work....
translation.zh: 找不到工作…

translation.en: So one day...
translation.zh: 所以有一天…

translation.en: ...he took off.
translation.zh: 他离开了家

translation.en: Didn't come back.
translation.zh: 再也没回来过

translation.en: My brothers and me, we split up to live with friends or relatives.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟们和我我们分开住在了亲戚朋友家

translation.en: Chasing a stupid dream...
translation.zh: 追逐一个愚蠢的梦想…

translation.en: ...causes nothing but you and everyone around you heartache.
translation.zh: 只会让你和你身边的人痛心

translation.en: Notre Dame is for rich kids...
translation.zh: 能进圣母大学的都是有钱人的孩子…

translation.en: ...smart kids...
translation.zh: 聪明孩子…

translation.en: ...great athletes. It's not for us.
translation.zh: 还有优秀运动员 我们进不了

translation.en: You're a Ruettiger.
translation.zh: 你是卢蒂格家的一员

translation.en: There's nothing in the world wrong with that.
translation.zh: 这一点没什么不好

translation.en: You can have a damn nice life.
translation.zh: 你可以过上不错的日子

translation.en: Frank is gonna take over plant number two.
translation.zh: 弗兰克将要接管二号厂房

translation.en: A couple years, he'll make more than me and Johnny.
translation.zh: 用不了几年他就会挣得比我和约翰尼还多

translation.en: You know he's in charge of the expansion program.
translation.zh: 你知道他负责扩建项目

translation.en: I don't wanna be Frank or John.
translation.zh: 我不想成为弗兰克或是约翰

translation.en: Excuse me, I need to see somebody about going to school here.
translation.zh: 不好意思我想找人问问来这里上学的事

translation.en: Now?
translation.zh: 现在？

translation.en: Admissions office doesn't open for another couple of hours, yet.
translation.zh: 招生办公室过几个小时之后才会开门

translation.en: There's gotta be somebody I can talk to now.
translation.zh: 我现在一定能找个什么人谈谈

translation.en: Please?
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: ...you could always talk to a priest. Maybe that's what you need, son.
translation.zh: 你可以随时找神父聊聊也许那就是你需要的 孩子

translation.en: Yeah, I'd appreciate that.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢

translation.en: Just a minute.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Mr. Ruettiger?
translation.zh: 卢蒂格先生？

translation.en: -Rudy. -I'm Father Cavanaugh.
translation.zh: -我是鲁迪-我是卡瓦诺神父

translation.en: How long have you thought about this decision?
translation.zh: 做出这个决定 你用了多久的时间？

translation.en: For as long as I can remember. I used to watch--
translation.zh: 从我记事起开始吧 我原来常常看…

translation.en: Have you taken the proper steps, investigated the process?
translation.zh: 你走过正常程序吗？研究过流程吗？

translation.en: Yes. I have more to learn, but--
translation.zh: 是的 我有很多要学习的东西 但是…

translation.en: Are you fully aware of the sacrifices you're gonna have to make?
translation.zh: 你完全清楚自己要做出的牺牲吗？

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'll do whatever it takes.
translation.zh: 我会不惜任何代价

translation.en: What brought you here today?
translation.zh: 你今天为什么来这里？

translation.en: I just came from my best friend's funeral. He said that--
translation.zh: 我刚参加完挚友的葬礼 他说过…

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: What do you mean, "Of course"?
translation.zh: 你说“当然”什么意思？

translation.en: Well, son, it's very common for people suffering a crisis...
translation.zh: 孩子 人们遭受打击…

translation.en: ...to seek escape into the cloth. We usually recommend a grieving--
translation.zh: 通常都会想要躲进罩子里我们一般会推荐一个悲痛…

translation.en: -Escape into the cloth? -That's just an expression we use...
translation.zh: -躲进罩子里？-这是我们使用的一个说法

translation.en: ...to describe people who are running from emotional or psychological pain...
translation.zh: 用来指那些希望通过成为神父来逃避感情

translation.en: ...by choosing priesthood.
translation.zh: 或心理痛苦的人

translation.en: You think I wanna become a priest?
translation.zh: 你以为我想当神父？

translation.en: Don't you?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: Nothing against being a priest, Father, but I don't think it's for me.
translation.zh: 我对当神父没有成见 神父但我觉得我不适合

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 那你来干嘛？

translation.en: I want to go to school at Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 我想来圣母大学读书

translation.en: Well, have you applied?
translation.zh: 你申请了吗？

translation.en: No, my grades have never been very good, even though I tried.
translation.zh: 没有 就算我很努力我的成绩还是一直不太好

translation.en: But I'll try harder. I'll study 20 hours a day, if I have to.
translation.zh: 但我会更加努力的必要的话我会一天学习二十个小时

translation.en: This university-- It's not for everybody.
translation.zh: 这所大学…不是人人都可以念的

translation.en: Ever since I was a kid, I wanted to go to school here.
translation.zh: 我从孩提时代起就想来这里读书了

translation.en: And ever since I was a kid, everyone said it couldn't be done.
translation.zh: 从那时起 大家就都说不可能

translation.en: My whole life...
translation.zh: 在我一生中…

translation.en: ...people have been telling me what I could do and couldn't do.
translation.zh: 人们一直告诉我什么能做什么不能做

translation.en: I've always listened to them, believed in what they said.
translation.zh: 我一直听他们的话 相信他们所说的

translation.en: I don't wanna do that anymore.
translation.zh: 我不想再那样了

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Rudy.
translation.zh: 好吧 鲁迪先生

translation.en: Here's the deal...
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: ...Holy Cross Junior College is nearby. I can get you one semester there.
translation.zh: 圣十字专科学校就在附近我能让你在那读一个学期

translation.en: You make grades...
translation.zh: 你成绩合格

translation.en: ...you get another semester.
translation.zh: 就可以再读一个学期

translation.en: Then maybe, with a high enough GPA...
translation.zh: 如果平均分数足够高 也许

translation.en: ...you might have a chance of getting into Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 你会有机会进入圣母大学

translation.en: Hey, kid!
translation.zh: 喂 孩子！

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
translation.zh: 你不能进来

translation.en: Hey, this place is really something else, huh?
translation.zh: 这地方很特别是吗？

translation.en: Someday, I'm gonna come out of that tunnel and run onto this field.
translation.zh: 总有一天 我会从那个通道里出来跑进这块场地

translation.en: Well, it ain't gonna be this day.
translation.zh: 反正不会是今天

translation.en: I'm here to play football for the Irish.
translation.zh: 我是来为爱尔兰人队打球的

translation.en: Coach Parseghian know about it?
translation.zh: 帕斯基恩教练知道吗？

translation.en: No, not yet.
translation.zh: 还不知道

translation.en: Well, maybe you best tell him first.
translation.zh: 那你最好先告诉他

translation.en: Yeah, you're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I should do.
translation.zh: 我是应该那么做

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I'll see you around.
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: Is he expecting you?
translation.zh: 你有预约吗？

translation.en: -No, but this will just take a second. -Now just a moment young man--
translation.zh: -没有 一会就好-等一下 小伙子…

translation.en: -Coach, can I talk to you for a second? -Sorry, coach, I tried.
translation.zh: -教练 能跟你说几句话吗？-抱歉 教练 我想拦住他来着

translation.en: -No, it's all right. I've got it. -Shall I close the door?
translation.zh: -没事 我来处理吧-要我关上门吗？

translation.en: No. How can I help you, son?
translation.zh: 不用 有事吗 孩子？

translation.en: I'm Rudy Ruettiger.
translation.zh: 我叫鲁迪卢蒂格

translation.en: I'm here to talk about playing football for Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 我来是想跟你谈谈为圣母大学打球的事

translation.en: Our walk-on tryout date was two weeks ago.
translation.zh: 我们的陪练队员选拔两周前就结束了

translation.en: I'm not talking about this year. I was thinking more about next springtime.
translation.zh: 我不是说今年 我想的是明年春天

translation.en: Are you a student here?
translation.zh: 你是这里的学生吗？

translation.en: No. I'm at Holy Cross.
translation.zh: 不是 我是圣十字专科学校的

translation.en: But I'm gonna be a student here.
translation.zh: 但我会成为这里的学生

translation.en: See, I've been a Notre Dame fan for as long as I can remember...
translation.zh: 我从小时候记事起

translation.en: ...since I was a little kid.
translation.zh: 就是圣母大学的球迷了

translation.en: In high school, I started-- Is it all right if I sit down?
translation.zh: 在高中 我开始…我能坐下吗？

translation.en: In high school, I started at cornerback.
translation.zh: 我在高中从角位打起

translation.en: I mean, I wasn't the quickest guy on the team, but--
translation.zh: 我不是球队里最快的那个 但是…

translation.en: Or the biggest. --but I led the team in tackles.
translation.zh: 也不是块头最大的但球队的防守是我领导的

translation.en: But, anyway...
translation.zh: 但是不管怎么说

translation.en: ...I've been working at a steel mill for about four years...
translation.zh: 我在一家钢铁厂工作了差不多四年

translation.en: ...and I've been saving up my money.
translation.zh: 一直在攒钱

translation.en: And I've been planning on coming here.
translation.zh: 一直计划着来这里

translation.en: My friend Pete, he really understood what my dream was.
translation.zh: 我朋友皮特 他非常理解我的梦想

translation.en: And he told me not to waste any more time.
translation.zh: 告诉我不要再浪费时间了

translation.en: But I don't know. For some reason, I couldn't....
translation.zh: 但是我不知道出于某种原因 我无法…

translation.en: See, he died in an accident on Friday.
translation.zh: 他周五死于一场事故

translation.en: And I came here right after the funeral.
translation.zh: 我在葬礼之后就来到这里

translation.en: You see what I mean?
translation.zh: 你明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: Son...
translation.zh: 孩子…

translation.en: ...I think you're in the wrong office.
translation.zh: 我想你进错办公室了

translation.en: Come on, now.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: I don't understand, coach.
translation.zh: 我不明白 教练

translation.en: You might want to go over and talk to Father Cavanaugh at the rectory.
translation.zh: 你可能会想找教区的卡瓦诺神父聊聊

translation.en: I talked to Father Cavanaugh, he's the one who got me into Holy Cross.
translation.zh: 我跟卡瓦诺神父聊过了就是他让我上圣十字专科学校的

translation.en: -He did? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是啊

translation.en: He said that if I got good enough grades at Holy Cross--
translation.zh: 他说如果我在圣十字成绩够好的话

translation.en: And I will, I promise. --I'd be able to get in here, officially.
translation.zh: 我发誓我会的 我就能正式来这里

translation.en: Anyway, I just wanted to introduce myself...
translation.zh: 总之我就想做个自我介绍

translation.en: ...and say I look forward to seeing you at practice.
translation.zh: 表达一下对在训练中见到您的渴望

translation.en: -Thank you. -So long.
translation.zh: -谢谢-再见

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: For us, divine inspiration does not mean that God possesses a man...
translation.zh: 对我们来说 神的启示并不意味着神会控制一个人

translation.en: ...and simply dictates the inspired text to him.
translation.zh: 然后简单地把旨意口授给他

translation.en: Rather, that God implants into a man's mind...
translation.zh: 相反 神会把总体概念

translation.en: ...the general concept.
translation.zh: 灌输进入他的头脑

translation.en: And when God does that...
translation.zh: 当神这么做时

translation.en: ...he allows the man to write that in the historical context in which he lives.
translation.zh: 他允许那人把这些都记入自己所生活的历史背景中

translation.en: What we call the Sitz im Leben, or that is, "the setting in life."
translation.zh: 我们称之为生活处境也可以说是“生活中的境况”

translation.en: So a man may have historical inaccuracies...
translation.zh: 一个人的记述可能会与历史有出入

translation.en: ...but God allows a man to write with those misunderstandings...
translation.zh: 但神允许人的记述中存在谬误

translation.en: ...because what is important and inherent is the theological concept...
translation.zh: 因为重要而且在本质上的是神试图…

translation.en: ...that God is trying to get across to mankind.
translation.zh: 让人类理解的神学概念

translation.en: I think that's all for today, ladies and gentlemen...
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 今天就到这里吧

translation.en: ...we will have a quiz on Monday, so please prepare yourselves for it.
translation.zh: 我们周一会有一次测验请你们做好准备

translation.en: Well done, Father.
translation.zh: 讲得好 神父

translation.en: Would you grade these for me, Dennis. I'd appreciate it.
translation.zh: 能帮我给这些打个分吗 德尼斯？我会感激不尽

translation.en: -Certainly. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -当然了-谢谢

translation.en: You learning stenography or what.
translation.zh: 你在学速记还是什么？

translation.en: Everything he's mouthing's in the goddamn book.
translation.zh: 他讲的内容都在书上

translation.en: I gotta make an A in this class.
translation.zh: 我这门课得拿优才行

translation.en: Just remember your Sitz im Leben, and it shouldn't be a problem.
translation.zh: 记住你的生活处境就行应该不是问题

translation.en: -You're gonna be great. -Hey, Nicky. Nicky.
translation.zh: -你会顺利的-喂 尼基

translation.en: I'm not talking to you, man. Not after what you did.
translation.zh: 我不跟你说话特别是你那么做之后

translation.en: You brought a girl to the party to meet me...
translation.zh: 你带了一个女孩去聚会上见我

translation.en: ...and the next thing you know, she sits next to Brian....
translation.zh: 接下来她坐在了布莱恩旁边…

translation.en: Hi, could you hold this?
translation.zh: 能帮我拿一下吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, sure. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -当然了-谢谢

translation.en: So you're interested in a room to rent?
translation.zh: 你想租房住？

translation.en: -I don't know, maybe. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我不知道 也许吧-是吗？

translation.en: My brother has a house about five blocks from campus.
translation.zh: 我哥哥在离校园五个街区之外有处房子

translation.en: I'm sick and tired of--
translation.zh: 我受够了…

translation.en: -I have an extra card I can give you. -Just forget it.
translation.zh: -我有张多余的名片 给你留下吧-算了吧

translation.en: Forget it. I'll see you.
translation.zh: 算了 回头见

translation.en: -If you're interested, call soon. -All right.
translation.zh: -如果你有兴趣的话 尽快打电话-好的

translation.en: -Maybe tonight. All right, bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -也许今天晚上 好吧 再见-再见

translation.en: You don't have a goddamn clue, do you?
translation.zh: 你一点都不知道 是吗？

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 知道什么？

translation.en: About how to get an A in that class.
translation.zh: 怎么在那门课上拿到优

translation.en: I could help you.
translation.zh: 我能帮你

translation.en: Look, besides being an honor student at Notre Dame...
translation.zh: 听着 除了是圣母大学优秀学生…

translation.en: ...and a TA in Father:
translation.zh: 和神父的助教之外

translation.en: I'm also a tutor for hire.
translation.zh: 我还是一名有偿家教

translation.en: I can't even afford a room to rent.
translation.zh: 我连一个房间都租不起

translation.en: Wait, maybe we can make some other kind of deal.
translation.zh: 等等 也许我们可以做个别的交易

translation.en: What kind of deal?
translation.zh: 什么交易？

translation.en: Well....
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: I got Notre Dame pretty well staked out, you know.
translation.zh: 我把圣母大学观察得很仔细

translation.en: Staked out?
translation.zh: 观察仔细？

translation.en: Girls. I just don't know if here, at Holy Cross--
translation.zh: 女孩子们 我只是不知道在圣十字这里…

translation.en: -Sorry. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -抱歉-抱歉

translation.en: I don't know the girls here at Holy Cross. I was wondering--
translation.zh: 我不认识圣十字这里的女孩我在想…

translation.en: -What's your point? -Well, maybe you could....
translation.zh: -你想说什么？-也许你可以…

translation.en: What...?
translation.zh: 什么…？

translation.en: -Just introduce me to a few-- -I don't know any girls here.
translation.zh: -把我介绍给几个…-我不认识这里的女孩

translation.en: So be it.
translation.zh: 那算了

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Hey, wait.
translation.zh: 喂 等等

translation.en: Hey, wait a minute.
translation.zh: 喂 等一下

translation.en: Maybe I do know some girls.
translation.zh: 也许我确实认识一些女孩

translation.en: In fact, I know a lot of girls.
translation.zh: 实际上我认识很多女孩

translation.en: -I just gotta find them. -That's the spirit.
translation.zh: -只是我得找到她们-这才像话

translation.en: As you can see, I'm pretty goddamn desperate.
translation.zh: 你应该能看出来 我都快要绝望了

translation.en: I'm D-Bob.
translation.zh: 我叫帝鲍勃

translation.en: -Rudy. -And I'm in love.
translation.zh: -我叫鲁迪-我想谈恋爱

translation.en: -Oh, hey, how you doing? -Don't say anything.
translation.zh: -你好吗？-什么都别说

translation.en: Hey, that's a pretty sweater you're wearing. This is my friend D-Bob.
translation.zh: 你穿的毛衣真好看 这是我朋友帝鲍勃

translation.en: He's feeling not well.
translation.zh: 他现在不太舒服

translation.en: Will you cut it out? I got an image around here.
translation.zh: 你能住嘴吗？在这我得保持形象

translation.en: Branski twisted his knee. He's not gonna make next week's--
translation.zh: 布兰斯基扭伤了膝盖下周没法上场了…

translation.en: -This the practice field, right? -All practices are closed.
translation.zh: -这是训练场 是吗？-所有训练都不许观看

translation.en: -I know Coach Parseghian. -Are you--?
translation.zh: -我认识帕斯基恩教练-你是…

translation.en: -I talked to him the other day. -Watch out.
translation.zh: -我前两天跟他谈过-小心

translation.en: I'm getting real tired of doing the drills....
translation.zh: 我烦死了训练…

translation.en: -Step back, okay? -All right.
translation.zh: -后退 好吗？-好的

translation.en: Hey, coach!
translation.zh: 嗨 教练！

translation.en: Hey, you gotta keep your eyes open around here, kid.
translation.zh: 在这里得把眼睛睁大点 孩子

translation.en: Hey, coach.
translation.zh: 喂 教练

translation.en: Coach Parseghian...
translation.zh: 帕斯基恩教练

translation.en: ...anything I can do to help the team, you just let me know.
translation.zh: 要是我能帮球队做点什么 尽管告诉我

translation.en: See you.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Who's that? -Your lunch breaks...
translation.zh: -他是谁？-你的午餐休息时间

translation.en: ...are long, now go plug in the end zone.
translation.zh: 太长了 现在去插上达阵区的电源

translation.en: -Okay, boss. Right, boss. -Tell Jake I need to talk to him.
translation.zh: -好的 老板 是 老板-告诉杰克我要跟他谈谈

translation.en: What did I tell you about trespassing?
translation.zh: 我不是说了不能随便进来吗？

translation.en: They said you're the guy in charge, the guy I need to talk to.
translation.zh: 他们告诉我这里你管事有事得跟你说

translation.en: -I need your help. -Why should I help you?
translation.zh: -我需要你的帮助-我为什么要帮你？

translation.en: I wanna be your assistant.
translation.zh: 我想做你的助手

translation.en: I don't need an assistant, I've got a full crew.
translation.zh: 我不需要助手 我这里人手都齐了

translation.en: Couldn't you use somebody else? I mean, I'll work for free.
translation.zh: 你就不能用用别人吗？我可以无偿工作

translation.en: What's in it for you?
translation.zh: 你这么做是为了什么？

translation.en: I volunteered to help the football team-- Do anything I can...
translation.zh: 我自愿给橄榄球队帮忙做什么都行

translation.en: ...but they wouldn't let me because I'm not a student.
translation.zh: 但他们不让 因为我不是这里的学生

translation.en: But I will be.
translation.zh: 但我会是的

translation.en: If I'm gonna play on this field, I need to know the lay of the land.
translation.zh: 如果我想在这座球场打球我就得了解地形

translation.en: You're nuts.
translation.zh: 神经病

translation.en: A lot of people have been saying that.
translation.zh: 最近很多人都这么说

translation.en: Well, you've gotta be nuts, you want to work for nothing.
translation.zh: 只有神经病才会愿意无偿工作

translation.en: I just wanna be a part of this university.
translation.zh: 我只想成为这所大学的一份子

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Meet me here tomorrow, 10 a.m.
translation.zh: 明天上午10点到这里见我

translation.en: -Thanks. -Minimum wage.
translation.zh: -谢谢-最低工资

translation.en: -Thanks again. -All right.
translation.zh: -再次感谢-没事

translation.en: Did you understand?
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？

translation.en: You're not listening, you don't understand what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 你没听我说话 你不明白我在说什么

translation.en: -Let me help. -You sure?
translation.zh: -我来帮你-你确定？

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah, no problem. Here. -I got it.
translation.zh: -是的 没问题 来-我来拿

translation.en: -Keep it straight, kid. -Okay.
translation.zh: -保持直线 孩子-好的

translation.en: -Poet. Scholar. -Dickinson. Dickinson. Dickinson.
translation.zh: -诗人 学者-迪金森

translation.en: Hut-hut. Blue and gold, let's go.
translation.zh: 开球 爱尔兰战士 加油

translation.en: -Hi there, what's your name? -Donna.
translation.zh: -你好 你叫什么名字？-唐娜

translation.en: -Great. My name's Rudy Ruettiger. -Hi, I'm Colleen.
translation.zh: -太好了 我叫鲁迪卢蒂格-你好 我叫科琳

translation.en: -I've got this buddy, D-Bob. -D-Bob? With the two watches?
translation.zh: -我有个朋友叫帝鲍勃-帝鲍勃？戴着两块手表的那个人？

translation.en: You mean "Mr. Marshall Field's"?
translation.zh: 你是说“马绍尔菲尔德”先生？

translation.en: -His name's D-Bob, he's a sweetheart. -Well, maybe I'll see you around later.
translation.zh: -他叫帝鲍勃 人很好-也许我们回头再见吧

translation.en: -No, I have class. -I sit behind you in 235.
translation.zh: -不 我要去上课-我在235教室 坐在你后面

translation.en: -Two watches. -Two watches.
translation.zh: -两块手表-两块手表

translation.en: Don't read the question if it's a long test in a short period. Right?
translation.zh: 考试内容多而时间短的话就不要读问题 知道吗？

translation.en: -All right. -Two of them will be similar.
translation.zh: -知道了-其中两个会很接近

translation.en: It's gonna be one of those two. One's absurd, forget about that one.
translation.zh: 会是那二者中的一个还有一个不着边 别管那个

translation.en: All right, this is important, though.
translation.zh: 这很重要

translation.en: "Psychological or changed behavioral responses"--
translation.zh: “心理或改变的行为反应”…

translation.en: -What do you think? -Excuse me, I'm sorry to interrupt...
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？-不好意思 抱歉打断你们

translation.en: ...but I just have to ask you, have we met somewhere before?
translation.zh: 但我必须问一下你们我们之前在什么地方见过吗？

translation.en: You know, you look really familiar to me.
translation.zh: 你看上去真的很眼熟

translation.en: Maybe psych class. Do you have that on Monday, Wednesday, Friday?
translation.zh: 也许是在心理课上你周一、周三、周五有那门课吗？

translation.en: I'm in there at 10:00.
translation.zh: 我10点钟会到那里

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, he's in that class.
translation.zh: 是的 他上那节课

translation.en: I bet that's where. I knew you looked familiar.
translation.zh: 我想就是在那里我说你怎么这么面熟呢

translation.en: Well, anyway, this is kind of embarrassing, but...
translation.zh: 总之 这有点让人尴尬 可是…

translation.en: ...you heard about the dance on Saturday night, right?
translation.zh: 你们听说周六晚上的舞会了吗？

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah, we've heard about it. Sure.
translation.zh: -听说了？-是的 我们当然听说了

translation.en: Okay. All right, well, you know, I was just wondering...
translation.zh: 好吧 我就是想知道

translation.en: ...do you have any plans?
translation.zh: 你们有什么安排吗？

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh: -没有-没有

translation.en: That's great. So you're available, huh?
translation.zh: 太好了 这么说你们有空？

translation.en: -D-Bob would love to go. -Really? This is so great.
translation.zh: -帝鲍勃很乐意去-真的吗？太棒了

translation.en: I would love to introduce you to my roommate, Elza.
translation.zh: 我很高兴介绍你们认识我的室友艾尔莎

translation.en: Elza, come here.
translation.zh: 艾尔莎 过来

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: D-Bob's suspicious, so he made me go to a language lab to take tests.
translation.zh: 帝鲍勃对我没信心所以让我去语言实验室参加考试

translation.en: They said I have a slight case of dyslexia.
translation.zh: 他们说我有轻微的阅读障碍

translation.en: It's like when the words get all mixed up in your head when you're reading.
translation.zh: 就是说你在阅读时那些字会在你脑子里混成一团

translation.en: I've been doing these exercises to get better.
translation.zh: 我一直在做练习 想要改善自己

translation.en: And guess what. I got an A on a literature test.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着 我文学考试拿了个优

translation.en: Oh, that's great, kid.
translation.zh: 了不起 孩子

translation.en: Hey, do you live in here?
translation.zh: 你在这住？

translation.en: Believe it or not, got my own home.
translation.zh: 信不信由你 我自己有家

translation.en: That cot's for when my sciatica acts up.
translation.zh: 那张简易床是我坐骨神经痛发作时用的

translation.en: Okay, let's go to work.
translation.zh: 好了 干活去吧

translation.en: -See that hose on top of the locker? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -看见储物柜顶上的管子了吗？-看见了

translation.en: Bring that with you.
translation.zh: 带上它

translation.en: So you're in student housing?
translation.zh: 这么说你住在学生宿舍？

translation.en: No, I'm living with a friend in town.
translation.zh: 不 我跟一个朋友住在城里

translation.en: Where in town?
translation.zh: 城里什么地方？

translation.en: -I haven't found a place to stay yet. -Funds pretty low, huh?
translation.zh: -我还没找到住的地方-没钱？

translation.en: All my savings went for tuition.
translation.zh: 我的积蓄都用来交学费了

translation.en: I shower at Holy Cross. I'm getting by all right. So this is it, huh?
translation.zh: 我在圣十字学院洗澡 还算过得去就是这里了？

translation.en: Yeah, this is where it all starts and finishes.
translation.zh: 是啊 这就是一切开始和结束之地

translation.en: "I've gotta go, Rock. It's all right. I'm not afraid.
translation.zh: “我要走了 洛克 没关系的我不害怕

translation.en: Sometime, Rock, when the team's up against it...
translation.zh: 有一天 洛克 当球队处境困难

translation.en: ...and things are wrong and the breaks are beating the boys...
translation.zh: 问题接踵而至球员在中场休息时段备受折磨时

translation.en: ...tell them to go in there and win just one for the Gipper.
translation.zh: 告诉他们走进那里 为吉佩尔赢一场

translation.en: I don't know where I'll be then, Rock, but I'll know about it...
translation.zh: 我不知道那时我身在何处洛克 但我会知道…

translation.en: ...and I'll be happy."
translation.zh: 而且我会很高兴”

translation.en: The Four Horsemen.
translation.zh: 四骑士

translation.en: Knute Rockne.
translation.zh: 努特罗克尼

translation.en: Moose Krause.
translation.zh: 慕斯克劳斯

translation.en: Angelo Bertelli.
translation.zh: 安吉洛贝尔泰利

translation.en: Johnny Lujack.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卢杰克

translation.en: Leon Hart, Terry Hanratty, John Huarte, Jack Snow.
translation.zh: 利昂哈特、特里汉拉蒂、约翰华尔特、杰克斯诺

translation.en: John Lattner.
translation.zh: 约翰拉特纳

translation.en: Paul Hornung could've dressed in this locker.
translation.zh: 保罗霍尔农本来可以用这个更衣柜的

translation.en: We got work to do, kid.
translation.zh: 我们有活要干 孩子

translation.en: "We're gonna go inside. We're gonna go outside. Inside and outside.
translation.zh: “我们要冲入他们的防线冲出他们的防守 来回冲击

translation.en: We're gonna get them on the run. We're gonna keep them on the run.
translation.zh: 让他们跑动起来 要让他们一直跑动

translation.en: And then we're gonna go. Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 然后我们就要向前冲冲 冲 冲！

translation.en: We're not gonna stop until we're across that goal line.
translation.zh: 在越过达阵线之前 我们不会停下来

translation.en: This is a team they say is good. Well, I think we're better than them.
translation.zh: 他们说这支球队很棒我觉得我们比他们更棒

translation.en: They can't lick us.
translation.zh: 他们打败不了我们

translation.en: What do you say, men?"
translation.zh: 你们说呢 伙计们？”

translation.en: By the way, Gipper, I got your gym card.
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 吉佩尔我帮你拿到健身卡了

translation.en: -You got it. That's great. -Wait, we had a deal.
translation.zh: -你拿到了 太好了-等等 我们说好的

translation.en: -I do your laundry for two months. -It was harder to get than I anticipated.
translation.zh: -我给你洗两个月的衣服-这张卡比我想的还要难弄

translation.en: -It's gonna be a semester. -Of doing your laundry?
translation.zh: -要一个学期才行-洗一个学期？

translation.en: -Come on, let me see. -A semester.
translation.zh: -快点 让我看看-一个学期

translation.en: All right, fine. Just let me see the card.
translation.zh: 好吧 让我看看卡

translation.en: -Come on, that's impossible. -It's your job to give it a shot.
translation.zh: -算了吧 不可能的-试试看 这是你的任务

translation.en: -She's out of our league. -Hi.
translation.zh: -我们完全没有机会-你好

translation.en: Tell her I'm a "Field's."
translation.zh: 告诉她我是“菲尔德”家族的人

translation.en: As in Marshall Field's. She'll know. Just tell her that, please.
translation.zh: 就是马绍尔菲尔德家族她会知道的 求你了 告诉她

translation.en: -Okay, see you later. -See you.
translation.zh: -好吧 一会见-一会见

translation.en: That looks great. I think you'll really enjoy it, thanks a lot.
translation.zh: 看上去很好 我觉得你会很喜欢的多谢了

translation.en: Hi, are you interested in joining a student activity?
translation.zh: 你好 你有兴趣参加学生活动吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Here's your choices.
translation.zh: -是的-你可以从这里选择

translation.en: Do you see that guy over there? Over by the pillar.
translation.zh: 你看到那边的那个人了吗？柱子旁边

translation.en: Could you maybe wave at him a little bit? Just kind of humor him.
translation.zh: 你能跟他招个手吗？就是让他开心一下

translation.en: Please?
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I'm gonna be late. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 我要迟到了 再见

translation.en: -That was perfect. Thank you. -Well?
translation.zh: -太好了 谢谢你-那…？

translation.en: Choir looks good. I used to sing in the high school choir.
translation.zh: 唱诗班看着不错我以前在高中唱诗班唱过

translation.en: -What's Football Boosters? -We organize the pep rallies...
translation.zh: -橄榄球后援会？-我们会在比赛前一晚组织动员会

translation.en: ...and paint the helmets the night before.
translation.zh: 给头盔涂漆

translation.en: And do the card section.

translation.zh: 四、五、六…

translation.en: ...seven, eight!
translation.zh: 七、八！

translation.en: One, two, three, four...
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四…

translation.en: ...five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 五、六、七、八

translation.en: Let me tell it to you as clean as I can.
translation.zh: 我要尽量跟你们说清楚

translation.en: We have 95 players here...
translation.zh: 这里有95名球员

translation.en: ...so accomplished as athletes in high school...
translation.zh: 作为运动员 他们在高中就成绩斐然

translation.en: ...we gave them full scholarships...
translation.zh: 我们给了他们全额奖学金

translation.en: ...to the best football program in the country.
translation.zh: 参加全国最优秀的橄榄球项目

translation.en: NCAA regulations allow us to dress just 60 for home games...
translation.zh: 全国大学体育协会规定我们的主场比赛只能派六十人出场

translation.en: ...which means at least 35 scholarship players...
translation.zh: 也就是说至少有35名获得奖学金的运动员

translation.en: ...are gonna be watching from the stands.
translation.zh: 将坐在观众席上观看比赛

translation.en: So if any of you has any fantasies about running out of that tunnel...
translation.zh: 所以如果有人幻想戴着在阳光下闪闪发光的金色头盔

translation.en: ...with your gold helmet shining in the sun...
translation.zh: 跑出那条通道

translation.en: ...you best leave them right here.
translation.zh: 那就最好把它们留在这里

translation.en: Of you 15 dreamers out there, maybe we'll keep one or two.
translation.zh: 15名梦想家里面也许我们会留下那么一两个

translation.en: My job is to basically beat the shit out of you for the next five days.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是要在接下来的五天里让你们痛不欲生

translation.en: And whoever is still standing at the end...
translation.zh: 坚持到最后的人

translation.en: ...maybe we'll use for our scout teams.
translation.zh: 也许我们会让他们进入陪练队

translation.en: You'll be running the opposition's plays...
translation.zh: 你们会周而复始地使用

translation.en: ...week in and week out.
translation.zh: 对手的打法

translation.en: Your greatest value to us is we don't care whether you get hurt.
translation.zh: 你们对我们最大的价值就在于我们不关心你们是否受伤

translation.en: Our first teams are gonna pound on you...
translation.zh: 我们的一线队员们会把你们当成最大的敌人

translation.en: ...like you're their worst enemies.
translation.zh: 对你们狂轰乱炸

translation.en: Like what you hear so far?
translation.zh: 我说的这些都明白了吗？

translation.en: Any of you want to run home to Mama?
translation.zh: 要是有人想回家找妈妈？

translation.en: Now's your chance.
translation.zh: 现在就是机会

translation.en: Joe, they're all yours.
translation.zh: 乔 都交给你了

translation.en: Don't just stand there trying to think. Let's hit those ropes. Move it!
translation.zh: 别光在那里瞎琢磨去绳索那边 快点！

translation.en: Move it, I said! Come on!
translation.zh: 我说了 快点！快！

translation.en: Pick them up, pick them up!
translation.zh: 速度快点！

translation.en: High knees! Let's go, gentlemen, let's go!
translation.zh: 抬高膝盖！加油 队员们 加油！

translation.en: Pump your arms, keep your heads up.
translation.zh: 胳膊甩起来 头抬起来

translation.en: That's it, don't step on that rope!
translation.zh: 就是这样 别踩到绳子！

translation.en: Up and down, let's go! Quickness. We want to see how quick you are.
translation.zh: 起来趴下 加油！速度让我们看看你们有多快

translation.en: A little to the right, little men. Keep it rolling, keep it rolling.
translation.zh: 往右边一点 小家伙们 继续滚

translation.en: Heads up, keep moving, keep moving.
translation.zh: 抬起头 继续移动

translation.en: Pump those arms, pump those arms when you're backwards running.
translation.zh: 向后跑的时候要把胳膊甩起来

translation.en: Move them, move them, move them!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Keep your heads up, keep your heads up!
translation.zh: 抬起头来！

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Gonna have any quit? Let's go.
translation.zh: 有人要退出吗？加油

translation.en: Watch the ball.
translation.zh: 盯着球

translation.en: Get in there, Ruettiger, get in there!
translation.zh: 上啊 卢蒂格 上啊！

translation.en: All right, let's concentrate and get it right. You, come on.
translation.zh: 好了 集中精神好好做你 过来

translation.en: -Go hard, charge him. -Okay, set.
translation.zh: -用力 撞他-好 准备

translation.en: Hike!
translation.zh: 开球！

translation.en: -Set. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -准备-开始

translation.en: Hike!
translation.zh: 开球！

translation.en: What is that? What is that? What are you doing? Come on!
translation.zh: 这是什么？你们在干嘛？加油！

translation.en: Who has the play? Who wants to do it right?
translation.zh: 谁知道怎么做？谁知道怎么做？

translation.en: -I got it. -Come on.
translation.zh: -我来-加油

translation.en: -Right, stay low. Stay low and get it. -Set.
translation.zh: -对了 趴低一点 低一点 上-准备

translation.en: Get through that.
translation.zh: 冲过去

translation.en: -Come on, let's do it again! -Now you hit.
translation.zh: -加油 再来一次！-现在你来撞

translation.en: -Go on, get out of here. -Come on, coach, I can do it.
translation.zh: -起来 一边去-教练 我能行

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? All right, we'll see. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？好吧 我们看看-好

translation.en: Stay low.
translation.zh: 趴低一点

translation.en: This is where we separate the men from the girls.
translation.zh: 男人跟女人的区别就在这里

translation.en: Thirty, hit the spot.
translation.zh: 三十号战术 冲击这个点

translation.en: Come on, pick it up, pick it up, pick it up.
translation.zh: 加油 继续

translation.en: Get in there. Pick him off, pick him off. Right there. Pick him off, damn it!
translation.zh: 上啊 拦住他 就在那边拦住他 该死！

translation.en: All right, all right, all right. Come on, 27, let's get in there.
translation.zh: 好了 加油 27号战术 上吧

translation.en: Let's see if you wanna make this team, damn it.
translation.zh: 让我们看看你想不想加入球队 见鬼

translation.en: Come on, dig in.
translation.zh: 加油 站稳

translation.en: Relax for a few minutes.
translation.zh: 休息几分钟

translation.en: Coach, if it was up to me, I'd get rid of all of them.
translation.zh: 教练 如果让我决定的话我会把他们都赶走

translation.en: John, if they can't protect themselves, I don't want them.
translation.zh: 约翰 要是他们不能保护自己我就不会留他们

translation.en: -The kid with blood all over his jersey. -Ruettiger?
translation.zh: -那个球衣上都是血的小子-卢蒂格？

translation.en: Have you been watching? No athletic skill.
translation.zh: 你们看到了吗？没有运动技巧

translation.en: He's put more effort than any two guys we've got.
translation.zh: 他比我们那两个人都更努力

translation.en: You fellas decide.
translation.zh: 你们决定吧

translation.en: Not in my defensive backfield. You want him, you got him.
translation.zh: 我的防守后场不需要他你想要的话你留下吧

translation.en: All right, shower up. We'll let you know.
translation.zh: 好吧 去洗澡 我们会通知你们的

translation.en: You think you made it?
translation.zh: 你觉得你能被选中吗？

translation.en: Unfortunately, yeah.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 我会的

translation.en: What is so unfortunate about making the team?
translation.zh: 能入选有什么不幸？

translation.en: This is my third year as a walk-on.
translation.zh: 这是我第三年当陪练了

translation.en: I had scholarships to two Big 10 schools...
translation.zh: 我获得了十大联盟中两所大学的奖学金

translation.en: ...but my father was an all-American here...
translation.zh: 但我父亲以前是这里的全美最佳球员

translation.en: ...so I get a lot of family pressure.
translation.zh: 所以我有很多来自家庭的压力

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: If you haven't been cut, then you still have a chance.
translation.zh: 如果你没被踢出去那就证明你还有机会

translation.en: -What, a chance to play? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么 有比赛的机会？-是的

translation.en: The only reason they keep me on here is because I'm a legacy.
translation.zh: 他们把我留在这里的唯一原因就是因为我是名人后代

translation.en: To them, I'm no more valuable than a tackling dummy.
translation.zh: 对他们来说 我不过就是个会拦截的笨蛋

translation.en: Ruettiger, come with me.
translation.zh: 卢蒂格 跟我来

translation.en: Yeah, coach.
translation.zh: 是 教练

translation.en: You want on the team pretty bad.
translation.zh: 你很想参加球队

translation.en: You have no idea.
translation.zh: 你不知道我有多想

translation.en: -Sure busted your balls out there. -Coach, I'll do anything.
translation.zh: -你刚才被撞得很惨-教练 我会不惜一切代价

translation.en: Now, you think you can give the same effort...
translation.zh: 你觉得自己在接下来五个月里

translation.en: ...day in and day out for the next five months?
translation.zh: 能每天都付出同样的努力吗？

translation.en: Sir, I have no doubt.
translation.zh: 先生 我一定会的

translation.en: Fine. If you do lighten up one hair...
translation.zh: 好吧 要是你有一丝松懈…

translation.en: ...I'll throw your butt off this team so fast you won't know what hit you.
translation.zh: 我就会把你赶出球队快到你完全没反应

translation.en: Wait a minute, throw me off the team? I gotta be on the team first, right?
translation.zh: 等等 把我赶出球队？那我得先加入球队 对吗？

translation.en: -Don't let me down, kid. -Does that mean I'm on the team?
translation.zh: -别让我失望 小子-就是说我被选中了？

translation.en: -Yeah, kid, you're on the team. -Thank you!
translation.zh: -是的 小子 你加入球队了-谢谢你！

translation.en: Hey, hey, come on. Go put some shoes on.
translation.zh: 喂 好了 去把鞋穿上

translation.en: Yeah, we're gonna have to replace these supports over here.
translation.zh: 我们得把这里的支架换掉

translation.en: Give me a hand.
translation.zh: 帮我一把

translation.en: Thanks for everything.
translation.zh: 谢谢你所做的一切

translation.en: -Here. -What's that?
translation.zh: -给-那是什么？

translation.en: It's the key to the maintenance room.
translation.zh: 维修间的钥匙

translation.en: Don't know nothing about it.
translation.zh: 我什么都不知道

translation.en: Yeah....
translation.zh: 是啊…

translation.en: Remember, you promised.
translation.zh: 记住 你答应过的

translation.en: You'll come see your first game if I ever dress.
translation.zh: 如果我上场 你要来看你的第一场比赛

translation.en: You got a nut on you?
translation.zh: 你身上有螺帽吗？

translation.en: Well, I'll stop by every now and again, just to bother you.
translation.zh: 我会时不常地来看看骚扰一下你

translation.en: See you later.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Hey, kid.
translation.zh: 喂 小子

translation.en: You ever dress...
translation.zh: 只要你上场…

translation.en: ...I'll be there.
translation.zh: 我就会去看

translation.en: Sloppy! Run it again. Sloppy, for chrissake!
translation.zh: 打起精神！再来一次看在老天的份上

translation.en: Thirty-eight counter. The back missed the hole.
translation.zh: 38号反击战术 后卫没能填上漏洞

translation.en: -He's gotta go to the outside. -Okay, coach.
translation.zh: -他会跑到外边去-好了 教练

translation.en: You all right, man? Come on, get up.
translation.zh: 你还好吧 伙计？加油 起来

translation.en: -Get in the huddle, man. -Ruettiger.
translation.zh: -去集合 哥们-卢蒂格

translation.en: Ruettiger, get out.
translation.zh: 卢蒂格 出来

translation.en: I can do it, coach!
translation.zh: 我能行的 教练！

translation.en: -Right, let's go, boys. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好了 走吧 小伙子们-好的

translation.en: -Ready? -Right, let's go, fellas.
translation.zh: -准备好了？-好 上吧 伙计们

translation.en: And hut!
translation.zh: 开球！

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 喂 你在干嘛？

translation.en: Don't treat me like your kid brother. I'm playing defenseman for Purdue.
translation.zh: 别把我当成你的小弟弟我现在是普渡大学的防守队员

translation.en: You ain't here to be no nanny in no kindergarten!
translation.zh: 你来这里不是当幼儿园保姆的！

translation.en: -Now, go play ball. -Hit me, man.
translation.zh: -现在 去打球-来撞我 哥们

translation.en: Red 40!
translation.zh: 红色40号战术！

translation.en: Red 40!
translation.zh: 红色40号！

translation.en: Set, hut!
translation.zh: 准备 开球！

translation.en: Keep your ass down.
translation.zh: 你给我趴下吧

translation.en: Get your ass down, boy.
translation.zh: 趴下吧 小子

translation.en: -Come on, get in here. -Huddle. Huddle up, guys.
translation.zh: -加油 都过来-集合 伙计们

translation.en: So on Eagle, do I go on "set" or "two"?
translation.zh: 执行老鹰战术时 我要去“开球线”还是“两码线”？

translation.en: Gotta go on "set." You gotta pick the man up.
translation.zh: 你得去“开球” 你要压住那个人

translation.en: On Eagle Slant, do I let him slide or do I pick him up too?
translation.zh: 在老鹰侧身战术时 我要把他放过去还是同样要压住他？

translation.en: Hey, little buddy. Hold up, man.
translation.zh: 喂 小家伙 等等

translation.en: I'm not talking to you. Keep going.
translation.zh: 我不是在跟你说话 你走吧

translation.en: I wanna tell you, I'm sorry about what happened at practice.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你我对训练时发生的事很抱歉

translation.en: Don't be sorry.
translation.zh: 不用抱歉

translation.en: Man, if you don't cool it, you're gonna end up getting yourself killed.
translation.zh: 哥们 如果你不放松一点迟早会把自己害死的

translation.en: If I cool it, I won't be helping you guys get ready for the next week's games.
translation.zh: 如果我放松的话 就没法帮助你们准备好下周的比赛了

translation.en: Got it?
translation.zh: 明白了吗？

translation.en: I got it.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: He's just a showboat, man. That's all he's about.
translation.zh: 他就是爱出风头 就是那种人

translation.en: He's just doing his job, Jamie. Can it.
translation.zh: 他只是在做他的份内工作 贾米闭嘴

translation.en: Go Irish!
translation.zh: 加油 爱尔兰人队！

translation.en: Go Irish!
translation.zh: 加油 爱尔兰人队！

translation.en: Break!
translation.zh: 突破！

translation.en: -Let's go. Come on. -Come on, here we go.
translation.zh: -走吧 加油-来吧 我们来了

translation.en: Stick it to him, stick it to him!
translation.zh: 盯紧他！

translation.en: Watch and learn. Watch him.
translation.zh: 仔细盯着 盯住他

translation.en: Let's go, Rudy!
translation.zh: 来吧 鲁迪！

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing, huh? Come here.
translation.zh: 你在干嘛？过来

translation.en: -Hey, break it up. Break it up. -Get off of me!
translation.zh: -住手-放开我！

translation.en: -Come on, Ruettiger. -Get out of there.
translation.zh: -算了 卢蒂格-离开那里

translation.en: Beak it up. Break it up, I said. And cool down.
translation.zh: 我说了 住手 冷静一下

translation.en: You brown-nosed suck ass! You suck ass!
translation.zh: 你这个马屁精！混蛋！

translation.en: -Ruettiger, get back to the huddle. -What's your problem, O'Hare?
translation.zh: -卢蒂格 回去集合-你怎么了 奥黑尔？

translation.en: Last practice of the season and this asshole thinks it's the Super Bowl.
translation.zh: 这是赛季最后一场训练这个混蛋当成了超级碗

translation.en: Why, you just summed up your entire sorry career here in one sentence.
translation.zh: 你刚刚用一句话总结了你整个令人遗憾的职业生涯

translation.en: If you had the heart of Ruettiger's, you could have made all-American.
translation.zh: 要是你有卢蒂格那样的决心早就成全美最佳运动员了

translation.en: As it is, you just went from the third team to prep team.
translation.zh: 既然这样你刚从三级队被降到预备队了

translation.en: Go on, get out of here. Get me another tailback.
translation.zh: 走吧 离开这里 给我重新找个尾卫

translation.en: -Huddle! -Come on, let's run it.
translation.zh: -集合！-加油 快点

translation.en: Come on, let's rock some ass. Come on now.
translation.zh: 来吧 加把劲吧

translation.en: -Huddle! -Let's go. Defense, come on out.
translation.zh: -集合！-快点 防守组 快过来

translation.en: Now, Rudy, I want you to ice this twice more in your room tonight.
translation.zh: 鲁迪 你今晚在房间里多冰敷两次

translation.en: We'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们明天再帮你看看

translation.en: And keep that pack on that shoulder for at least 15 more minutes.
translation.zh: 冰袋要在肩膀上再敷至少15分钟

translation.en: Hey, Jim.
translation.zh: 喂 吉姆

translation.en: Your bullshit is making us all look bad, so why don't you dial it down a notch.
translation.zh: 你那句废话让我们脸上都过不去你不能收敛一点吗？

translation.en: -Dial it down? -Everybody's getting sick of hearing:
translation.zh: -收敛？-大家都听够了：

translation.en: "Put out more like Ruettiger."
translation.zh: “像卢蒂格那样加把劲”

translation.en: What do you get out of getting your head kicked in every day?
translation.zh: 每天被人撞个半死对你有什么好处？

translation.en: It's not worth it, you know?
translation.zh: 不值得的 明白吗？

translation.en: You gotta be in one play during a regular game...
translation.zh: 你必须在常规比赛中出一次场

translation.en: ...to go down in the books as officially being part of this team.
translation.zh: 才能被正式列为队员

translation.en: Only uniform you're gonna be putting on...
translation.zh: 你只能一直穿身上那套

translation.en: ...is that grungy thing you've been wearing.
translation.zh: 邋遢的队服

translation.en: Man, if you hate it so much, why don't you just quit?
translation.zh: 哥们 要是你这么不情愿为什么不退出？

translation.en: I can't.
translation.zh: 我不能

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不能？

translation.en: If I quit, my father won't pay my tuition.
translation.zh: 我退出的话 我爸爸就不会替我付学费

translation.en: Is that the only reason you're here?
translation.zh: 这就是你在这里的唯一理由？

translation.en: Part of me is under the delusion that...
translation.zh: 我还幻想着自己能有机会

translation.en: ...I might get a chance to run out that tunnel.
translation.zh: 从那个通道里跑出去

translation.en: What does he think, I'm lying to him?
translation.zh: 他觉得我在骗他？

translation.en: Nobody said nothing about lying.
translation.zh: 没人说你撒谎

translation.en: Do I have to get pictures taken of practice to prove I'm on the team?
translation.zh: 是不是我得拍一些训练照才能证明我在球队？

translation.en: -I believe you, Rudy. -What happened to my face?
translation.zh: -我相信你 鲁迪-我的脸呢？

translation.en: Where did I get these? Professional wrestling?
translation.zh: 这些都是怎么来的？职业摔角？

translation.en: -So, you're a glorified water boy. -Oh, you just don't get it.
translation.zh: -这么说你是个光荣的送水员-你就是不明白

translation.en: If you are on that team, my opinion of Notre Dame football hit the shits.
translation.zh: 如果你是球员那我对圣母大学橄榄球队可看走眼了

translation.en: -Leave him alone. -There's no "if."
translation.zh: -别管他-没有什么“如果”

translation.en: I wear a uniform, I block and I tackle. You just don't understand.
translation.zh: 我穿着队服 拦截擒抱 你就是不信

translation.en: Actually, it's really simple.
translation.zh: 其实很简单

translation.en: Every Saturday when we turn on the TV to watch the Irish play...
translation.zh: 每个周六我们都会打开电视观看爱尔兰人队的比赛

translation.en: ...a lot of players wear the blue and gold.
translation.zh: 很多球员都穿着蓝色和金色的队服

translation.en: -We just don't see you. -Shoot it, Frankie.
translation.zh: -只是看不到你-打球 弗兰克

translation.en: -You will. -What did you say?
translation.zh: -你们会看到的-你说什么？

translation.en: You will. Now shoot.
translation.zh: 你们会的 现在打球吧

translation.en: Just shoot.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Coach, Rudy Ruettiger's here to see you.
translation.zh: 教练 鲁迪卢蒂格来找你

translation.en: Send him in.
translation.zh: 让他进来

translation.en: This won't take long, coach.
translation.zh: 一会就好 教练

translation.en: First, I'd just like to thank you for the opportunity of being part of the team.
translation.zh: 首先我想谢谢你给我这次入队机会

translation.en: Rudy, I never thought I'd be saying this...
translation.zh: 鲁迪 我从没想过我会这样说

translation.en: ...but it's been a pleasure. Now what can I do for you?
translation.zh: 这是我的荣幸 我能帮你做什么？

translation.en: Well, one of the many things that I've learned this year...
translation.zh: 这几年我学到了很多东西其中一条就是

translation.en: ...is that no matter how hard I try, I'm never gonna get above the prep team.
translation.zh: 不管我多么努力我永远都没有机会离开预备队

translation.en: I've kind of accepted that God made certain people to be football players...
translation.zh: 我已经开始接受这一点了上帝造了某些人当橄榄球员

translation.en: ...and I'm not one of them.
translation.zh: 而我不是其中一个

translation.en: I wish God would put your heart in some of my players' bodies.
translation.zh: 我希望上帝能把你的决心放进我队员的身体里

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: My father loves Notre Dame football more than anything else in the world.
translation.zh: 我爸爸热爱圣母大学橄榄球队胜过世界上其他一切

translation.en: He doesn't believe I'm on the team...
translation.zh: 他不相信我加入了球队

translation.en: ...because he can't see me at the sidelines during the games.
translation.zh: 因为他在比赛中的边线旁看不见我

translation.en: Next year, my senior year, I'd love to be able to give him this gift:
translation.zh: 明年是我最后一年我想送他一件礼物：

translation.en: I would really appreciate it if you could let me dress one game next season.
translation.zh: 如果下个赛季能让我出场比赛一次我会感激不尽

translation.en: Look, Rudy, the NCAA really hamstrings us with this 60 rule.
translation.zh: 听着 鲁迪 全国大学体育协会把人数严格控制在六十名

translation.en: In certain positions, we only have one backup.
translation.zh: 在某些位置上 我们只有一个替补

translation.en: You know every year, we're competing for the national championship.
translation.zh: 你知道每一年我们都在为全国冠军而努力

translation.en: Is this just for your father?
translation.zh: 这仅仅是为了你父亲吗？

translation.en: No. No, it's for everybody who told me that...
translation.zh: 不 是为了所有那些曾对我说

translation.en: ...being a Notre Dame football player would be impossible.
translation.zh: 我不可能进圣母大学橄榄球队的人

translation.en: It's for my brothers...
translation.zh: 是为了我的兄弟们

translation.en: ...the kids in my high school, the guys I work with at the mill.
translation.zh: 我高中的那些孩子们我在工厂的同事们

translation.en: They can't come to practice and see that I am part of the team.
translation.zh: 他们无法来训练场亲眼看到我是球队的一员

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Okay? -You deserve it.
translation.zh: -好？-这是你应得的

translation.en: You'll dress for one game next season.
translation.zh: 你下个赛季会参加一场比赛

translation.en: Thank you, coach.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 教练

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 是的！

translation.en: Well, I don't know which game yet, but it'll definitely be next season.
translation.zh: 我还不知道是哪一场但肯定就是下赛季

translation.en: I'm sure.
translation.zh: 我确定

translation.en: I don't know, I guess they'll tell me a couple of days before the game.
translation.zh: 我不知道我想他们比赛前几天会告诉我

translation.en: Look, just be ready, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 做好准备 好吗？

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 爸爸

translation.en: All right, bye.
translation.zh: 好吧 再见

translation.en: V-I-C-T-O-R-Y
translation.zh: 胜…利…

translation.en: Victory, victory, that's our cry
translation.zh: 胜利 那是我们的呼喊

translation.en: Gipper. Hey, Gipper!
translation.zh: 吉佩尔 喂 吉佩尔

translation.en: Goddamn Miami law school beckons.
translation.zh: 迈阿密法律学院向我招手了

translation.en: Miami!
translation.zh: 迈阿密！

translation.en: I had to go.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 看看吧

translation.en: Ara quit?
translation.zh: 阿拉不干了？

translation.en: I'll be goddamned. Who's the new coach?
translation.zh: 真见鬼 谁是新教练？

translation.en: Dan Devine from the Green Bay Packers.
translation.zh: 绿湾包装工队的丹迪瓦恩

translation.en: I'm sure Ara's gonna let him know about his promise to let you dress.
translation.zh: 我相信阿拉会告诉他答应你出场的事

translation.en: Come on, let's take a walk.
translation.zh: 来吧 出去走走

translation.en: When are you leaving?
translation.zh: 你什么时候走？

translation.en: -In about six minutes. -Really?
translation.zh: -大概六分钟之后-真的？

translation.en: The spring semester starts in two weeks.
translation.zh: 春季学期两周后开始

translation.en: We've had a hell of a goddamn--
translation.zh: 我们经历过…

translation.en: We've had a hell of a goddamn run, haven't we, Gipper?
translation.zh: 我们经历过很多事 对不对 吉佩尔？

translation.en: Yeah, we have.
translation.zh: 是啊 就是

translation.en: You let me know when you dress. I'm gonna fly right out for that.
translation.zh: 你出场的时候告诉我一声我会坐飞机回来看

translation.en: There's no way I can thank you for everything you've done.
translation.zh: 你为我做的一切 我感激不尽

translation.en: You already have.
translation.zh: 你已经感谢过了

translation.en: You remember Elza, right?
translation.zh: 还记得艾尔莎吗？

translation.en: -Hi. -Good to see you again.
translation.zh: -你好-很高兴再见到你

translation.en: She's my girl now. She's coming with me.
translation.zh: 她现在是我女朋友了 会跟我一起走

translation.en: -Isn't that goddamn something? -Dennis.
translation.zh: -这他妈不是件好事吗？-德尼斯

translation.en: What? I forgot.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我忘了

translation.en: I'm not allowed to say "goddamn" no more.
translation.zh: 我不能再说“他妈"的了

translation.en: What's a lapsed Catholic to do?
translation.zh: 离经叛道的天主教徒能干什么？

translation.en: -We should get going. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们得走了-是啊

translation.en: I'll see you next fall, right?
translation.zh: 明年秋天再见 是吗？

translation.en: Thanks for everything.
translation.zh: 谢谢你做的一切

translation.en: -You take care of him. -We're going.
translation.zh: -你要好好照顾他-我们要走了

translation.en: -Don't I know you? -Ruettiger!
translation.zh: -我认识你吗？-卢蒂格！

translation.en: Get your ass back out here!
translation.zh: 给我滚回来！

translation.en: Go! Go! Touchdown!
translation.zh: 加油！加油！达阵！

translation.en: Sorry, man.
translation.zh: 抱歉 哥们

translation.en: Rudy. Sorry, man.
translation.zh: 鲁迪 抱歉

translation.en: -Just ain't right. -No, it's not.
translation.zh: -这样不对-就是

translation.en: -Where are you going? -I quit.
translation.zh: -你去哪？-我退出了

translation.en: -Rudy, wait up. -The hell with Devine, hell with Yonto!
translation.zh: -鲁迪 等等-去他妈的迪瓦恩还有杨托

translation.en: Wait up. In two years, you haven't missed one practice.
translation.zh: 等等 两年了 你一场训练都没缺过

translation.en: The last one of senior year, you quit?
translation.zh: 最后一年最后一场你要退出？

translation.en: -That's what I said. I quit. -I don't want you to quit.
translation.zh: -我说过了 我退出-我不想让你退出

translation.en: What the hell is it to you?
translation.zh: 关你什么事？

translation.en: Rudy, you're one of the reasons I stayed on this last year.
translation.zh: 鲁迪 你是我最后一年留下来的原因之一

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You're sorry?
translation.zh: 你对不起？

translation.en: You're full of crap, you know that?
translation.zh: 你真是混蛋 知道吗？

translation.en: Everything you did and everything you said is bullshit!
translation.zh: 你说的 你做的都是狗屎！

translation.en: Tell Jake to make sure the tarp's ready.
translation.zh: 告诉杰克帆布一定要准备好

translation.en: We'll check with the weather service by 5, and we'll make a decision then.
translation.zh: 我们五点之前会看天气预报之后再做决定

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: What you doing here? Don't you have practice?
translation.zh: 你在这干嘛？你不用训练吗？

translation.en: Not anymore. I quit.
translation.zh: 再也不用了 我退出了

translation.en: Well, since when are you the quitting kind?
translation.zh: 你什么时候学会退缩了？

translation.en: I just don't see the point anymore.
translation.zh: 我只是再也找不到意义了

translation.en: So you didn't make the dress list.
translation.zh: 这么说你没上出场队员名单

translation.en: There are greater tragedies in the world.
translation.zh: 这个世界上还有更大的悲剧

translation.en: I wanted to run out of that tunnel for my dad.
translation.zh: 我本希望能从那个通道出来一次为了我父亲

translation.en: -To prove to everyone-- -Prove what?
translation.zh: -向所有人证明…-证明什么？

translation.en: -That I was somebody. -Oh, you are so full of crap.
translation.zh: -证明我能行-你简直不可理喻

translation.en: You're 5 feet nothing. A hundred and nothing.
translation.zh: 你身高也就一米五 体重九十斤

translation.en: And you've got hardly a speck of athletic ability.
translation.zh: 算不上有什么运动细胞

translation.en: You hung in with the best college football team in the land for two years.
translation.zh: 你在球场上跟最好的大学橄榄球队混了两年

translation.en: And you're also gonna walk out of here...
translation.zh: 从这里走出去的时候还能

translation.en: ...with a degree from the University of Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 拿到圣母大学的学位

translation.en: In this lifetime, you don't have to prove nothing to nobody except yourself.
translation.zh: 你在这辈子里不需要向别人证明除了你自己

translation.en: And after what you've gone through, if you haven't done that by now...
translation.zh: 在你经历过这么多之后如果到现在还没实现梦想

translation.en: ...it ain't gonna never happen.
translation.zh: 那就永远也实现不了了

translation.en: Now go on back.
translation.zh: 现在回去

translation.en: Sorry I never got you to see your first game in here.
translation.zh: 抱歉没让你在这里看你的第一场比赛

translation.en: Hell, I've seen too many games in this stadium.
translation.zh: 我在这座体育馆里看了太多场了

translation.en: -You said you never saw a game. -I've never seen one from the stands.
translation.zh: -你说你从没看过一场比赛…-从没在看台上看过

translation.en: You were a player?
translation.zh: 你以前是球员？

translation.en: I rode the bench for two years.
translation.zh: 我在板凳上坐了两年

translation.en: Thought I wasn't being played because of my color.
translation.zh: 当时觉得因为我是黑人所以才没机会上场

translation.en: I got filled up with a lot of attitude, so I quit.
translation.zh: 心里很不满 所以就退出了

translation.en: Still not a week goes by, I don't regret it.
translation.zh: 不到一个星期我就后悔了

translation.en: And I guarantee a week won't go by in your life...
translation.zh: 我敢保证不到一个星期

translation.en: ...you won't regret walking out, letting them get the best of you.
translation.zh: 你也会后悔退出 向他们屈服

translation.en: Now, you hear me clear enough?
translation.zh: 我说得够清楚吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Bill? The pitch was too soon, son. Quick, make him commit.
translation.zh: 比尔？后传的太早快点 交给他

translation.en: Thirty-eight option, 38 option.
translation.zh: 38号战术

translation.en: Let's hustle up.
translation.zh: 集合

translation.en: It's Rudy.
translation.zh: 是鲁迪

translation.en: Welcome back. Line up.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 排队去

translation.en: What the hell's going on down there? Let's get back to work.
translation.zh: 那边怎么了？回去继续训练

translation.en: Sixty hit. Sixty hit.
translation.zh: 六十号冲撞战术

translation.en: -Ready? -Irish!
translation.zh: -准备好了？-爱尔兰人队！

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 请进？

translation.en: Oh, hi, Roland. Come in.
translation.zh: 你好 罗兰德 进来

translation.en: I want Rudy to dress in my place, coach.
translation.zh: 我想让鲁迪替我出场 教练

translation.en: He deserves it.
translation.zh: 这是他应得的

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous.
translation.zh: 别开玩笑了

translation.en: Georgia Tech is one of the top offensive teams in the country.
translation.zh: 佐治亚理工大学队是全国进攻力最强的队伍之一

translation.en: You're an all-American and our captain. Act like it.
translation.zh: 你是全美明星球员 也是队长拿出队长的样子

translation.en: I believe I am.
translation.zh: 我相信我正这么做

translation.en: Me too, coach.
translation.zh: 我也是 教练

translation.en: I want Rudy to dress in my place.
translation.zh: 我想让鲁迪替我出场

translation.en: Coach, this is for Rudy.
translation.zh: 教练 这是给鲁迪的

translation.en: For Rudy, coach.
translation.zh: 给鲁迪的 教练

translation.en: I promise. This is the real thing.
translation.zh: 我发誓 这是真的

translation.en: I'm gonna be on the sidelines, in uniform.
translation.zh: 我会穿着队服 出现在边线

translation.en: Frank, I've never asked you for anything in my life.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 我这辈子都没求过你

translation.en: Promise me he'll be on that bus tomorrow.
translation.zh: 答应我会让他明天坐上那辆巴士

translation.en: Frank, I want you to be there too.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 我想让你也到场

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Come on, keep up with me.
translation.zh: 快点 跟上

translation.en: -Here you go. -What a day for a game, huh, coach?
translation.zh: -到了-天气多适合比赛啊 是吧教练？

translation.en: You bet.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: -All right. Go Irish! -Go Irish!
translation.zh: -好了 加油 爱尔兰人队！-加油 爱尔兰人队！

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-谢谢

translation.en: I'll get you on the way back. I don't got my wallet on me.
translation.zh: 我回去的时候去找你 我没带钱包

translation.en: This is our gate.
translation.zh: 我们从这个门进去

translation.en: Hey, Rudy?
translation.zh: 喂 鲁迪？

translation.en: I just want you to know that I think this is a great thing.
translation.zh: 我就想告诉你我觉得这太棒了

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: It's your day.
translation.zh: 今天属于你

translation.en: -I wish you could be out there with me. -I know.
translation.zh: -真希望你能跟我一起出场-我知道

translation.en: This is the most beautiful sight these eyes have ever seen.
translation.zh: 这是我见过的最美的一幕

translation.en: Come on, Dad.
translation.zh: 来吧 爸爸

translation.en: Huddle up.
translation.zh: 集合

translation.en: Bring it in, guys.
translation.zh: 都过来 伙计们

translation.en: Father.
translation.zh: 神父

translation.en: Everyone, take a hand.
translation.zh: 大家手拉手

translation.en: Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee.
translation.zh: 万福玛丽亚 你充满圣宠 主与你同在

translation.en: Blessed art thou among women...
translation.zh: 你在众女子中受赞颂

translation.en: ...and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
translation.zh: 你的亲子耶稣并受赞颂

translation.en: Holy Mary, mother of God...
translation.zh: 天主圣母玛利亚

translation.en: ...pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death. Amen.
translation.zh: 求你现在和我们临终时为我们罪人祈求天主 阿门

translation.en: -Notre Dame, Our Mother. -Pray for us!
translation.zh: -圣母 我们的母亲-为我们祈求！

translation.en: You all know what you have to do.
translation.zh: 你们都知道该怎么做

translation.en: Remember, no one...
translation.zh: 记住 没有人…

translation.en: ...and I mean no one...
translation.zh: 我是说没有人…

translation.en: ...comes into our house and pushes us around.
translation.zh: 能在我们的主场占上风

translation.en: This is your game now, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 这是你们的比赛 先生们

translation.en: And for you seniors, it's your last one, so make it count...
translation.zh: 对你们大四学生来说这是你们最后一战 所以要好好干…

translation.en: ...because you will remember it for the rest of your lives.
translation.zh: 因为你们会终生难忘

translation.en: -Let's get them. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -打败他们-耶！

translation.en: Rudy.
translation.zh: 鲁迪

translation.en: You ready, champ?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗 冠军？

translation.en: I've been ready for this my whole life.
translation.zh: 我一生都在为这一刻准备

translation.en: Then you take us out on the field.
translation.zh: 那你来领我们出场吧

translation.en: -Let's go. -Come on, Rudy. Come on, now.
translation.zh: -走吧-来吧 鲁迪 来吧

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the Fighting Irish, Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 圣母大学爱尔兰战士队

translation.en: All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 走吧

translation.en: Here they go!
translation.zh: 他们来了！

translation.en: -That's him, 45. -Okay, 45. You see him?
translation.zh: -他在那 45号-45号 你看见他了吗？

translation.en: Forty-five! Forty-five!
That's him! I know him! That's Rudy!
translation.zh: 他在那！我认识他！那是鲁迪！

translation.en: All right, you guys already know this...
translation.zh: 好了 你们已经知道了

translation.en: ...but this is the most important game of your lives.
translation.zh: 这是你们生命中最重要的一场比赛

translation.en: No excuses. Do the work.
translation.zh: 没有借口 好好干

translation.en: -Our Lady of Victory! -Pray for us!
translation.zh: -我们的圣母！-为我们祷告!

translation.en: What the hell? They're flying across the line.
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？他们简直是飞过线的

translation.en: Watch that number 70. He's waltzing with him.
translation.zh: 小心那个70号 他在跟他纠缠

translation.en: Forty yards for a Notre Dame touchdown.
translation.zh: 四十码 圣母大学队达阵 （圣母大学 佐治亚理工大学六比零）

translation.en: Fourth quarter, with only three minutes to play...
translation.zh: 第四节比赛还剩三分钟

translation.en: ...and the issue still in doubt.
translation.zh: 仍然难分胜负

translation.en: As Barrett fades back to pass...
translation.zh: 佐治亚理工学院的巴雷特后退

translation.en: ...for Georgia Tech from his own 30-yard line.
translation.zh: 从己方30码线处传球

translation.en: Looks upfield and throws.
translation.zh: 看向前场 把球传出

translation.en: Intercepted by Roland Steele.
translation.zh: 球被罗兰德斯蒂尔截住了

translation.en: He has a convoy of blockers down the sidelines.
translation.zh: 开路者在边线附近保护他

translation.en: Steele going in unmolested...
translation.zh: 斯蒂尔长驱直入…

translation.en: ...standing up, for a Notre Dame touchdown.
translation.zh: 站着为圣母大学队达阵得分

translation.en: It's a backbreaker for Georgia Tech.
translation.zh: 佐治亚理工学院队情况不妙

translation.en: -Joe, play all the seniors! -What about Rudy?
translation.zh: -乔 让所有大四生上！-那鲁迪呢？

translation.en: -Come on. Let him in for one play. -Absolutely not.
translation.zh: -来吧 让他打一场-绝对不行

translation.en: Coach, you gotta play him. You gotta play him, coach.
translation.zh: 教练 你得让他上场你得让他上 教练

translation.en: Come on, coach. One play.
translation.zh: 拜托 教练 就一场

translation.en: Give him a chance, coach.
translation.zh: 给他一次机会 教练

translation.en: Notre Dame all over the ball. Thompson recovers for the Irish.
translation.zh: 球旁边都是圣母大学队队员汤普森抢下了球

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -Go Irish! -Rudy.
translation.zh: -加油 爱尔兰人队！-鲁迪

translation.en: Rudy. Rudy.
translation.zh: 鲁迪

translation.en: Rudy. Rudy. Rudy.
translation.zh: 鲁迪

translation.en: Thirty-seven seconds remaining and it'll be all over here at Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 比赛还剩下37秒就要在圣母大学结束了

translation.en: Off to our left...
translation.zh: 在我们左边

translation.en: ...I'm starting to pick up the chant from the Notre Dame student body.
translation.zh: 我听到圣母大学的学生正在呼喊

translation.en: Can't quite make out just what it is at the moment.
translation.zh: 现在还听不清喊的是什么

translation.en: In any event, Dan Devine's gonna empty his bench...
translation.zh: 不论怎样 比赛时间所剩无几

translation.en: ...with just little time remaining in the ball game.
translation.zh: 丹迪瓦恩都会让替补队员悉数上场

translation.en: One of the ballplayers going into the game is Jamie O'Hare.
translation.zh: 其中一名上场球员名叫贾米奥黑尔

translation.en: You may recall that O'Hare was heavily recruited...
translation.zh: 你们可能会有印象 奥黑尔几年前

translation.en: ...throughout the country several years ago.
translation.zh: 曾辗转全国各地 为球队打球

translation.en: He came to Notre Dame...
translation.zh: 他后来到了圣母大学…

translation.en: ...and it's safe to say that his career has been a disappointment.
translation.zh: 应该说他的职业生涯很让人失望

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: -Rudy! Rudy! Rudy! -Listen. They're chanting for Rudy.
translation.zh: -鲁迪！-听啊 他们正在呼唤鲁迪

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: Kill the clock. Do it and go into a "V."
translation.zh: 采取拖延战术 排成V形

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: Let's go. Listen up. Victory formation.
translation.zh: 来吧 听好了 胜利队形

translation.en: The hell with Devine, Billy.
translation.zh: 去迪瓦恩的吧 比利

translation.en: Long as offense is out here Rudy can't play.
translation.zh: 在这里进攻 鲁迪就没法打了

translation.en: -We gotta run the play. -No, we gotta score now.
translation.zh: -我们得拖延时间-不 我们要得分

translation.en: -Come on. Let's get a score for Rudy. -Yeah, it's the last game.
translation.zh: -来吧 让我们为鲁迪得一分-对 这是最后一场比赛

translation.en: All right, this one's yours. All right, pro right.
translation.zh: 好吧 交给你们了 右侧进攻

translation.en: Thirty-eight halfback pass on one. On one. Ready?
translation.zh: 38号战术 半卫传给一号一号 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: What the hell is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干嘛？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Thirty-five yards for the touchdown.
translation.zh: 35码达阵得分

translation.en: Notre Dame, 23. Georgia Tech, 3.
translation.zh: 圣母大学23分 佐治亚理工大学3分

translation.en: That was for you.
translation.zh: 刚才是为了你

translation.en: What was that? Who called that play?
translation.zh: 刚才是怎么了？谁让那样打的？

translation.en: I tell you, it's just occurred to me...
translation.zh: 告诉你们 我刚刚才知道

translation.en: ...what the student body has been chanting the last two minutes.
translation.zh: 最后两分钟里学生们在呼喊什么

translation.en: It's the name "Rudy."
translation.zh: 是“鲁迪”这个人名

translation.en: Dan Ruettiger, a walk-on senior...
translation.zh: 丹卢蒂格是一位大四陪练球员

translation.en: ...and subject of a feature article...
translation.zh: 也是昨天学生报纸《观察者》

translation.en: ...in yesterday's student newspaper, The Observer.
translation.zh: 特刊的主题

translation.en: -After toiling for two years.... -All right, go get them, kid.
translation.zh: -经历了两年的艰辛…-好了 去打败他们 孩子

translation.en: Go, Rudy! Go, Rudy!
translation.zh: 加油 鲁迪！

translation.en: He's so little!
translation.zh: 他块头真小！

translation.en: Come on. One more play.
translation.zh: 加油 再来一次

translation.en: What do I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Stay on. Stay there.
translation.zh: 留下 留在那里

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: Rudy! Rudy! Rudy!
translation.zh: 鲁迪！

translation.en: That's it. All right!
translation.zh: 就是这样 对了！

translation.en: Yeah! Who's the wild man now!
translation.zh: 耶！现在谁是大明星！

translation.en: -That's it. You were right. -Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: -就是这样 你是对的-是的！

translation.en: -Rudy! -Go, Rudy!
translation.zh: -鲁迪！-加油 鲁迪！

translation.en: Since 1975 no other Notre Dame player...
translation.zh: （1975年之后再也没有球员被抬着离开球场）

translation.en: Daniel E. "Rudy" Ruettiger...
translation.zh: （丹尼尔“鲁迪”卢蒂格1976年从圣母大学毕业）

translation.en: ...graduated from the University of Notre Dame in 1976. Five of Rudy's younger brothers went on to college.
translation.zh: （鲁迪的五个弟弟都上了大学并且都获得了学位）
